name: <T as cpu::local::single_instr::SingleInstructionLoad>::load

arch::cpu::local::get_base.doc: Gets the base address for the CPU local storage by reading the GS base model-specific register.

core::ptr::const_ptr::<impl *const T>::r.doc:
Reads the value from `self` without moving it. This leaves the
 memory in `self` unchanged.

 See [`ptr::read`] for safety concerns and examples.

 [`ptr::read`]: crate::ptr::read()
